name: Frostsaber E'ko
tooltip:
Frostsaber E'ko

In Winterspring, you will fight great cats called frostsabers. These beasts possess incredible speed an' cunning. If you wish ta gain the speed a' da frostsaber, bring me da E'ko you find from dem.

Rememba, you must have the Cache of Mau'ari in your inventory if you want ta hunt for E'ko.

Requirements:
- Frostsaber E'ko x 3
